timeline.message: Use temporary variable to store value in security.hbs to avoid repetition

timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: Rather than testing at a lower level, you could look at TestAuthFilter and how it is used.  It might make sense to extend that in some way with a mock that can be controlled in the tests themselves.  Then you could also use Rest Assured here for more readable tests.
timeline.author: aklish
